com.persistit.mxbeans

Interface IOMeterMXBean


  • @MXBean
public interface IOMeterMXBean

    Manages statistics about various types of physical I/O operations. These are measures of I/O calls to the the file system and therefore only approximately represent the true volume of physical I/O operations.

    Author:
    peter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String MXBEAN_NAME 
      static String[] OPERATION_NAMES
      Abbreviated names for types of I/O operations measured by this bean: RV Read page from Volume RJ Read page from Journal CC Copy page from journal to volume WJ Write page from Journal TJ Write Transaction to Journal XX Other EVD Evict page from pool FJ Flush journal GP Get Page
      static String[] OPERATIONS 
      static String[] SUMMARY_ITEMS

      Set the path for file into which IO events should be logged, or null to disable IO logging.

    • Field Detail

      • MXBEAN_NAME

        static final String MXBEAN_NAME
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • OPERATION_NAMES

        static final String[] OPERATION_NAMES
        Abbreviated names for types of I/O operations measured by this bean:
        RV
        Read page from Volume
        RJ
        Read page from Journal
        CC
        Copy page from journal to volume
        WJ
        Write page from Journal
        TJ
        Write Transaction to Journal
        XX
        Other
        EV
        D
        Evict page from pool
        FJ
        Flush journal
        GP
        Get Page

      • OPERATIONS

        static final String[] OPERATIONS

      • SUMMARY_ITEMS

        static final String[] SUMMARY_ITEMS

    • Method Detail

      • getQuiescentIOthreshold

        long getQuiescentIOthreshold()
        Returns:
        the quiescentIOthreshold

      • setQuiescentIOthreshold

        void setQuiescentIOthreshold(long quiescentIO)
        Parameters:
        quiescentIO - the quiescentIOthreshold to set

      • getIoRate

        long getIoRate()
        Returns:
        the ioRate

      • setLogFile

        void setLogFile(String toFile)
                throws IOException
        Set the path for file into which IO events should be logged, or null to disable IO logging. Use care when enabling an I/O log because every I/O operation performed by Persistit results in a fixed-length record being added to the file. The resulting log file can become extremely large.
        Parameters:
        toFile -
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getLogFile

        String getLogFile()
        Returns:
        Path for file into which IO events should be logged, or null if IO logging is disabled.

      • totalBytes

        long totalBytes(String operation)
        Parameters:
        operation - An I/O operation name. Operation names are specified in OPERATIONS.
        Returns:
        Sum of size of all I/O operations of the specified operation type.

      • totalOperations

        long totalOperations(String operation)
        Parameters:
        operation - An I/O operation name. Operation names are specified in OPERATIONS.
        Returns:
        Count of size of all I/O operations of the specified operation type.
